1.0.1.name: wordpress/wp-embed-posts
1.0.1.description: This plugin allows users to embed posts into other posts. Posts are embeded by default by printing the title within an <h2> tag and by applything the_content filter to the post content. The plugin also adds a shortcode of wpembed_content which passes two variables, the post object and the post type to allow developers to have full control over how any given embeded post is rendered.
